news.title: Chasing the Next Hidden Gem? Pepe and Buttcoin Set the Stage, but APEMARS Steals the Spotlight as the Top Meme Coin Presale 2026 After Raising $200K+
news.body: The crypto market has a memory problem. Every cycle, traders swear they will spot the next hidden gem early.

news.title: Bitcoin Holds Firm Above $70,000 as Meme Coins Rally into the Weekend
news.body: Bitcoin steadied above $70,000 as pivotal legal and macroeconomic events loom next week.

news.title: Binance Expands RLUSD Across XRP Network, Unlocking New Liquidity Channels for Traders
news.body: Binance has fully integrated Ripple USD (RLUSD) on the XRP Ledger.

news.title: XRP Surges as Ripple CEO Takes Role Influencing Crypto Regulation, Bulls Eye Breakout Signal
news.body: XRP climbs sharply after Ripple CEO Brad Garlinghouse joins a key U.S. regulatory advisory committee.

news.title: Shiba Inu Completes Golden Cross on Hourly Chart, Rises 6%
news.body: Shiba Inu price rose 6%, with the market seeing its strongest weekend price action in over 20 weeks.

news.title: Fidelity Macro Chief Discusses Next Bitcoin Bull Market as Cycle Model Projects New Highs
news.body: Fidelity's director of global macro says bitcoin's drop to $60,000 likely marked the floor of its current cycle.

news.title: Robert Kiyosaki Will Choose Bitcoin Over Gold if Forced to Pick One Asset
news.body: Robert Kiyosaki says he would choose bitcoin over gold if forced to choose a single asset.

news.title: Judge Sentences PGI Founder to 20 Years for $201 Million Bitcoin Ponzi Scheme
news.body: The CEO of Praetorian Group International has been sentenced to 20 years in prison.

news.title: Everyone's job is safety: Elon Musk fires back at xAI exodus concerns
news.body: Elon Musk is being criticized for ignoring safety measures after former employees reported that he dismantled the internal safety department at his xAI startup.

news.title: Tether Buys Stake in Gold.com to Expand Tokenized Gold Access
news.body: Tether's $150 million investment in Gold.com aims to expand tokenized gold access for crypto users.
